name: Discipline and Punish
description:
"Where there is power, there is resistance."

"Power is not an institution, and not a structure; neither is it a certain strength we are endowed with; it is the name that one attributes to a complex strategical situation in a particular society."

This game Discipline and Punish created for Ludumdare game jam, thema was "Running out of power".

We interpreted the term "power" in spirit of French philosopher Michel Foucault.  Every social interaction is a manifestation of power and you have to maintain the fragilebalance between different disciplinary and represive institutions,.

Game was created in Unity3D by Alexander Wolodarsky, music by Marina Askania.
